text: 8.20 Tower Hamlets has consistently delivered more homes than any borough within London, with the period between 2012-2021 showing a total of 21,097 dwellings being delivered. However, the need and demand for new homes remains significant - as of April 2022, there were 21,840 households on the council’s Common Housing Register, providing a measure of the affordable housing need within the borough. 8.21 The overall median price for a property within Tower Hamlets across all types was £525,000 in September 2022 whilst the overall median rent across all bedroom types was £1,650 a month.
